column3: The time too was speeding on. Twenty-one minutes to eight! In a few minutes more he must set out or he would miss the train.

7:39 P.M.
Eva and Braque made $180 at Jack Cermak’s before complains from the nosy wait staff and whiny-ass sore losers forced them out. Then they made a quick five bucks at the famous Every 1’s A Wiener hot dog stand in Andersonville just for taking a bite from a Fire Dog. Eva actually took two bites, because that’s just who she was.
